snippet.title: 🚨 Farming Simulator 22 - ‘It’s a calling’ (Cinematic Trailer)
snippet.description:
Farming Simulator 22 releases November 22nd - pre-order now!
All pre-orders receive the CLAAS XERION SADDLE TRAC Pack for free. 

► https://farming-simulator.com/buy-now.php

More info on our blog!
► https://farming-simulator.com/newsArticle.php?&news_id=237

Farming Simulator 22 will be available for PC, Mac, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X/S, PlayStation 4, Xbox One. Enjoy a huge variety of farming operations focusing on agriculture, animal husbandry and forestry in three diverse American and European environments. Now with the exciting addition of seasonal cycles, production chains and more!
► New maps, crops, machines, brands and more
► Over 400 authentic machines and tools
► Over 100 real agricultural brands 
► Seasonal cycles & production chains 
► Multiplayer allows for cooperative farming
► ModHub offers free community-created content

► Farming Simulator Website: http://www.farming-simulator.com/ 
► Farming Simulator League Website: https://fsl.giants-software.com/
► Twitter: https://twitter.com/farmingsim
► Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/farmingsimulator/
► Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/giants.farming.simulator
► FSL Twitter: https://twitter.com/FSLeSports
► Discord: https://discord.gg/giantssoftware
► Twitch English: https://twitch.tv/giantssoftware
► Twitch Deutsch: https://twitch.tv/giantssoftwarede
► Get Farming Simulator 19 now on the official shop: https://www.farming-simulator.com/store.php
